title: New: Soleima – Wasted
body:
Love the production on this new track from Copenhagen’s **Soleima** – reminds me a bit of NAO or Ben Khan aka serious vibes, all merged with some killer songwriting.

Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
